name: <path::PathBuf as core::convert::From<&T>>::from

core::convert::AsRef::as_ref.doc: Converts this type into a shared reference of the (usually inferred) input type.

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

doc:
Converts a borrowed [`OsStr`] to a [`PathBuf`].

 Allocates a [`PathBuf`] and copies the data into it.
